keyMoments.title: Chopper Joins as Fifth Member
keyMoments.description: Tony Tony Chopper officially joins the Straw Hat Pirates as their ship's doctor, becoming the fifth member of the crew.
keyMoments.significance: The crew gains their first dedicated doctor, fulfilling a crucial role for their journey. This marks an important milestone in the crew's growth.

keyMoments.title: Preparation to Depart Drum Island
keyMoments.description: With Nami recovered and Chopper aboard, the Straw Hats prepare to leave Drum Island and continue their journey to Alabasta.
keyMoments.significance: The crew is now stronger and ready to continue their mission to help Vivi save her kingdom.

memberChanges.description: Tony Tony Chopper joins as the crew's doctor after being recruited by Luffy.
